page.title: 16RELIGION IN BAD'HAM/DENN'TON
page.content: 86 people attend a place of worship regularly, 150 occasionally, 18 families never. Numerically non- attendance is closely correlated in this & the previous generation but not always through the same families. Churches attended are widespread, often for denominational reasons. 47 families attend Badingham or Dennington church (both listed Grade 1) which form a benefice with 2 others, sharing a monthly pattern of services & a monthly newsletter. 4l attend other or unspecified C of E churches, l2 non-Conformist chapels, 2 Catholic. Minority denominations attract regularity of worship. Dennington Methodist chapel has a weekly service. Badingham Sunday School & Dennington Children's Church Club flourish & participate fully in parish, Deanery & Diocesan events.
